name: Naman Raj
key_projects: Get Me a Chai: Crowdfunding platform with Next.js, MongoDB, Razorpay, NextAuth.js for user contributions and secure transactions, deployed on Vercel.
Resume Review: Automated resume shortlisting tool using Next.js, TypeScript, FastAPI, SpaCy, and Sentence-BERT for semantic similarity analysis.
KisanSetu: Blockchain-based platform with Solidity smart contracts, Gemini API for multi-lingual AI chatbot, and Firebase for authentication and data storage.
Password Manager: Secure password manager with React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB, and Docker for containerization.
key_strengths: Strong foundation in modern web technologies (React, Next.js, Node.js, FastAPI)
Proficient in multiple programming languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Go)
Experience with various databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Firebase)
Hands-on experience with DevOps tools (Docker, GitHub Actions)
Proactive in building full-stack projects from scratch
Ability to integrate third-party APIs (Razorpay, Gemini API, NextAuth.js)
areas_for_improvement: Explore advanced topics in specific domains
